captions.text: Do fish take baths a lot?
I came down for the baby's arrival,
But the dead father's thoughts became archival.
I don't know what you mean when you say -
I don't know what you mean when you say -
It's so damn fine to be alive,
Until your dorky, farting, turdface brother arrives.
A dark force to boldly apprehend.
But she was destined for the burger anyway.
I don't know what you mean when you say -
I don't know what you mean when you say -
(Like it says on my friend Katie's arm...)
(Like it says on my friend Katie's arm...)
(Like it says on my friend Katie's arm...)
(Like it says on my friend Katie's arm...)
I don't know what you mean when you say -
I don't know what you mean when you say -

I don't know what
(DFTB, DFTB, DFTBA,)

you mean when you say -
(DFTB, DFTB, DFTBA!)

I don't know what
(DFTB, DFTB, DFTBA,)

you mean when you say -
(DFTB, DFTB, DFTBA!)

As you might expect, that was not one hundred
percent my work.
Thank you to all of the Nerdfighters who suggested DFTBA acronyms,
and all of the Nerdfighters who illustrated DFTBA acronyms,
but most of all, most importantly,
the most important person of this entire project was Michael Aranda!
So, I wrote about your rap lyrics, and I was like,
"I don't know how to turn this into a song,"
so I instant-messaged Michael Aranda, and he was like:

That guy's so cool. You need to go subscribe
to him ... right now. Go subscribe to him.
And, I will see all of you very soon.
